scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-color-difference.js -c -m -o build/d3-color-difference.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && cp ../d3-color-difference/build/d3-color-difference.js d3-color-difference.v1.js && cp ../d3-color-difference/build/d3-color-difference.min.js d3-color-difference.v1.min.js && git add d3-color-difference.v1.js d3-color-difference.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-color-difference ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-color-difference.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-color-difference.js build/d3-color-difference.min.js
